name: Dezgo
description: Dezgo is an AI-powered platform for generating high-quality images and videos from text prompts.
longDescription: Dezgo is an online AI image and video generator that leverages Stable Diffusion and Flux models to create high-quality visuals from text descriptions. Its mission is to simplify the creative process for artists, content creators, and businesses by providing an intuitive tool for generating images and videos without requiring advanced technical skills. The platform supports a variety of use cases, including website graphics, social media content, and product illustrations. Users can access a free version with limitations or opt for a paid Power Mode for unrestricted features. Dezgo also offers an API for developers to integrate its AI capabilities into their own applications. By providing options like negative prompts and adjustable guidance, Dezgo ensures users have control over the creative output.
features: Text-to-image generation creates unique, detailed images from descriptive text prompts for various creative purposes.
Negative prompts allow users to specify elements to exclude from generated images, enhancing output precision.
Adjustable guidance settings control how strictly the AI adheres to the text prompt, balancing creativity and accuracy.
Multiple AI models, such as Stable Diffusion and Flux, cater to different styles like anime or 3D renders.
Image-to-image transformation modifies existing images based on text prompts for customized results.
Video generation creates stunning videos from text prompts or animates images with minimal effort.
Canny Edges feature extracts outlines from control images for free, enabling structural guidance in image generation.
Body Pose feature allows users to generate characters in specific postures using a source image.
API access enables developers to integrate Dezgoâ€™s AI image generation into their own applications.
High-resolution output options support professional-grade visuals for marketing and design needs.
No account required for free usage, making it accessible for quick image generation tasks.
Power Mode removes limitations like rate caps and resolution restrictions for paid users.

faqs.question: What is Dezgo used for?
faqs.answer: Dezgo is used to generate high-quality images and videos from text prompts, ideal for creating visuals for websites, social media, and marketing materials.

faqs.question: Is Dezgo free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, Dezgo offers a free version with unlimited image generation, though it includes limitations like rate caps and resolution restrictions.

faqs.question: What is Power Mode in Dezgo?
faqs.answer: Power Mode is a paid upgrade that removes restrictions like rate limits and resolution caps, offering ad-free usage and access to advanced features.

faqs.question: Can I use Dezgo images commercially?
faqs.answer: Yes, users own the rights to generated images and can use them commercially, provided they follow the CreativeML Open RAIL-M license terms.

faqs.question: How does the negative prompt feature work?
faqs.answer: The negative prompt lets users specify elements to exclude from the generated image, refining the output to better match their vision.

faqs.question: What AI models does Dezgo use?
faqs.answer: Dezgo uses Stable Diffusion 1.5 and Flux models, with options like 'Anything' for anime and 'Redshift' for detailed 3D renders.

faqs.question: Do I need an account to use Dezgo?
faqs.answer: No account is required for the free version, but creating one unlocks Power Mode and access to your generation history.

faqs.question: Can developers integrate Dezgo into their applications?
faqs.answer: Yes, Dezgo offers an API for developers to integrate fast AI image generation into their products or services.

faqs.question: How long does it take to generate an image?
faqs.answer: Image generation typically takes up to 30 seconds, depending on the complexity of the prompt and settings.
